data.fullContent: An important diagnostic tool for doctors, radiologic imaging, which includes such machines as x-rays, computerized tomography scans (CT scans), and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), makes it possible to view and analyze the interior organs of the body. X-rays are a type of electromagnetic radiation. They can pass through soft tissue but are blocked by bone. Doctors can use x-ray images of the skeleton to look for problems with joints, bones, and muscles. The CT scanner produces cross-sectional images of soft tissue as well as bone. An MRI uses strong magnetic fields to produce pictures depicting soft tissue.

q1.translation: 对医生来说，放射成像是一种重要的诊断工具，它包括x光、计算机断层扫描(CT扫描)和磁共振成像(MRI)等机器，使观察和分析身体内部器官成为可能。x射线是一种电磁辐射。
q1.front: An important diagnostic tool for doctors, radiologic imaging, which includes such machines as x-rays, computerized tomography scans (CT scans), and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), makes it possible to view and analyze the interior organs of the body. X-rays are a type of electromagnetic radiation.
q1.content: An important ____ tool for doctors, radiologic imaging, which ____ such machines ____ x-rays, computerized tomography scans (CT scans), and magnetic resonance ____ (MRI), ____ it possible to view and analyze the interior organs of the body. X-rays are a type of electromagnetic radiation.

q2.translation: 对医生来说，放射成像是一种重要的诊断工具，它包括x光、计算机断层扫描(CT扫描)和磁共振成像(MRI)等机器，使观察和分析身体内部器官成为可能。x射线是一种电磁辐射。它们可以通过软组织，但会被骨头阻塞。医生可以使用骨骼的x光图像来寻找关节、骨骼和肌肉的问题。CT扫描仪可以产生软组织和骨骼的横断面图像。核磁共振成像利用强磁场产生描绘软组织的图像。
q2.front: An important diagnostic tool for doctors, radiologic imaging, which includes such machines as x-rays, computerized tomography scans (CT scans), and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), makes it possible to view and analyze the interior organs of the body. X-rays are a type of electromagnetic radiation.
q2.middle: They can pass through soft tissue but are blocked by bone.
q2.ending: Doctors can use x-ray images of the skeleton to look for problems with joints, bones, and muscles. The CT scanner produces cross-sectional images of soft tissue as well as bone. An MRI uses strong magnetic fields to produce pictures depicting soft tissue.

options.sentence: The main reason for using diagnostic imaging techniques is to provide a clearer picture of the internal organs.
Abdominal scans can be obtained by a doctor in an outpatient clinic or an emergency situation.
Doctors use diagnostic tools like x-rays, CT scans, and MRI to analyze the interior of the body.
Digital radiographs are taken on a computer by either the patient or the technologist.
